sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>public</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_publications.RecipientListUploadAJAXProcessor</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>true</client_callable>
        <description>AJAX processor to validate records prior to upload of user records from excel.</description>
        <name>RecipientListUploadAJAXProcessor</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var RecipientListUploadAJAXProcessor = Class.create();
RecipientListUploadAJAXProcessor.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    /**
     * Start the Scripted Hierarchical Worker if one does not already exist
     */
    start: function() {

		var entityType = this.getParameter("sysparm_ajax_processor_entity_type");
		var recList = this.getParameter("sysparm_ajax_processor_entity_list");
		var totalRecords = this.getParameter("sysparm_ajax_processor_entity_record_count");
		
        var worker = new GlideScriptedHierarchicalWorker();
        worker.setProgressName(gs.getMessage("Uploading file"));
        worker.setScriptIncludeName("sn_publications.RecipientListUploadProcessor");
		worker.setScriptIncludeMethod("trackValidateUploadProgress");
		worker.putMethodArg("totalRecords", totalRecords+"");
        worker.setBackground(true);
        worker.start();
		return worker.getProgressID();
    },
    
    type: 'RecipientListUploadAJAXProcessor'
});]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2018-02-06 23:54:23</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>2c896a3e87441300d99a8467a7cb0b36</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>RecipientListUploadAJAXProcessor</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Targeted Communications" source="sn_publications">0fdd6483d72302004f1e82285e61033a</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Targeted Communications">0fdd6483d72302004f1e82285e61033a</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2c896a3e87441300d99a8467a7cb0b36</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2018-02-08 09:23:52</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
